summary:
about pepe origins - Welcome to pepe origins taking $PEPE back to its inception in the world of meme's. Pepe originated in a 2005 comic by Matt Furie called Boy's Club. It became an Internet meme when its popularity steadily grew across Myspace, Gaia Online and 4chan in 2008. By 2015, it had become one of the most popular memes used on 4chan and Tumblr4. In the summer of 2023 the shitcoin world came alive with the explosive entrance of $PEPE! Hitting a 1.4 billion dollar market cap in just 24 days and currently sitting at just over 700m. The story of $PEPE and Matt Furie has shocked the CT space with $PEPE never donating a penny to Matt Furie despite Pepe being his creation.

 about pepeo - Gaia Online and 4chan in 2008. By 2015, it had become one of the most popular memes used on 4chan and Tumblr4. In the summer of 2023 the shitcoin world came alive with the explosive entrance of $PEPE! Hitting a 1.4 billion dollar market cap in just 24 days and currently sitting at just over 700m. The story of $PEPE and Matt Furie has shocked the CT space with $PEPE never donating a penny to Matt Furie despite Pepe being his creation.

 along comes pepeo - Unlike $PEPE we will be supporting and appreciating Matt Furie's creation by donating. The smart contract will be renounced to the dead address for customer safety and the liquidity will be burnt ensuring zero ownership. total supply:420,690,000,000,000 marketing and cex2% Liquidity98% matt furie donations n/a
